subtitle: These classic melt-in-your-mouth buttery biscuits are dipped in chocolate for a little added luxury!

method.text: Beat the butter until smooth. Beat in the icing sugar until pale and fluffy. Sift together the flour and baking powder. Beat flour into the butter mixture with the vanilla.

Spoon the mixture into a piping bag fitted with a medium star nozzle. Pipe finger shapes about 7 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>2</sub> cm in length and 7.5cm rounds onto baking trays lined with baking parchment, spacing them well apart.
Bake for 10-12 min or until golden brown. Remove from oven. Leave to cool slightly on the trays. Then allow to cool completely on a wire rack.
Place the chocolate in a heatproof bowl over a pan of simmering water. Heat gently for 3-5 min or until melted.
Dip each end of the Viennese whirls in the chocolate to coat. Leave to set on a wire rack.

title: Viennese whirls
